message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond its price.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy it if we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm motivated to sell, $8,000 is significantly below its value.  Could you meet me at $13,000? This offer reflects the product's worth and my willingness to negotiate.

I understand that you think the product is worth more, but I'm still not comfortable with $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $9,500. This is my final offer, and I'm counting on your response.
